methods.mapOnNext:
This helper allows one to propagate the onError/onComplete calls through to the delegate, while applying the
 provided mapping function to the original input objects. The mapper may return null to skip sending a message
 to the delegated stream observer.

Note: Java generics information - <T,
V>

:param delegate: (io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<V>) - the stream observer to ultimately receive this message
:param mapper: (java.util.function.Function<T,V>) - the function that maps from input objects to the objects the stream observer expects
:return: (io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<T>) a new stream observer that maps from T to V before delivering to delegate::onNext
methods.rpcWrapper:
*Overload 1*  
  Note: Java generics information - <T extends java.io.IOException>
  
  :param log: io.deephaven.io.logger.Logger
  :param response: io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<?>
  :param lambda: io.deephaven.util.FunctionalInterfaces.ThrowingRunnable<T>
  
*Overload 2*  
  Note: Java generics information - <T>
  
  :param log: io.deephaven.io.logger.Logger
  :param response: io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<?>
  :param lambda: java.util.concurrent.Callable<T>
  :return: T
methods.safelyError:
Writes an error to the observer in a try/catch block to minimize damage caused by failing observer call.

Note: Java generics information - <T>

:param observer: io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<T>
:param statusCode: com.google.rpc.Code
:param msg: java.lang.String
methods.safelyExecute:
Wraps the provided runner in a try/catch block to minimize damage caused by a failing externally supplied helper.

:param runner: (io.deephaven.util.FunctionalInterfaces.ThrowingRunnable<java.lang.Exception>) - the runnable to execute safely
methods.safelyExecuteLocked:
Wraps the provided runner in a try/catch block to minimize damage caused by a failing externally supplied helper.

:param lockedObject: java.lang.Object
:param runner: (io.deephaven.util.FunctionalInterfaces.ThrowingRunnable<java.lang.Exception>) - the runnable to execute safely
methods.securelyWrapError:
*Overload 1*  
  :param log: io.deephaven.io.logger.Logger
  :param err: java.lang.Throwable
  :return: io.grpc.StatusRuntimeException
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param log: io.deephaven.io.logger.Logger
  :param err: java.lang.Throwable
  :param statusCode: com.google.rpc.Code
  :return: io.grpc.StatusRuntimeException
